resources.string: No starred items found! Please go back and select \"Play all lessons\" in order to mark lessons as starred.

No Assimil Audio Files have been found on your device. If the lessons show up in the \"Google Play Music\" app, you might be learning a language that is not yet supported by Selma. Please contact the author, who will be glad to be extend this free app with a little help (answering some questions) from you.
